wedo_instance.description: Realization of the Clawed Monster TEE wrapper on AWS Nitro substrate, including bit-perfect EIF generation and Cloudflare sovereign tunneling.

meta.philosophy: Deployment is the final strike. We transition from local staging to a hardened silicon notary, ensuring the Lobster is forever encapsulated by the Law.

tasks.description: Remote Substrate Sync: rsync the clinical repository to 98.87.28.157, preserving legislative seals (.sealed).
Nitro Hardening: Verify AWS Nitro CLI configuration and vsock-to-http dependencies on the remote host.
EIF Realization: Execute build_eif.sh to generate the Enclave Image File and extract PCR fingerprints.
Sovereign Launch: Boot the Nitro Enclave and map vsock port 8001 to the Lobster's metabolic stream.
Cloudflare Realization: Provision a cloudflared tunnel to bind floral.monster to the TEE-gated production port (3001).
Forensic Verification: Perform a live SIS-01 Trinity handshake on the remote domain to secure the anchor.
